Body:
file_path = _get_file_path('example.txt')
info = FileInfo.from_path(file_path)
response = get_response_for_file(Request('GET', b'/example', [(b'Range',
    range_value), (b'If-Range', info.etag.encode() + (b'' if matches else
    b'xx'))]), file_path, 1200)
expected_status = 206 if matches else 200
assert response.status == expected_status
if not matches:
    body = await response.read()
    with open(file_path, mode='rb') as actual_file:
        assert body == actual_file.read()
pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('range_value,matches', [[b'bytes=0-10', True], [
    b'bytes=0-10', False], [b'bytes=10-20', True], [b'bytes=10-20', False]])
